issue.title: [CI][Python] Github actions macOS python 3 build is using python 2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The "AMD64 MacOS 10.15 Python 3" build is also running in python 2.

Possibly related to how brew is installing python 2 / 3, or because it is using the system python, ... (not familiar with mac)
